articles.title: Joint Preparatory Committee Formed in Ecuador
Celebration Meetings Held Abroad
articles.content:
Joint Preparatory Committee Formed in Ecuador 
    Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- An Ecuadorian joint preparatory 
committee to commemorate the Day of the Sun and celebrate February 16, the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il, in 2004 was inaugurated with due ceremony in Quito on November 23.    
 At the ceremony Humberto Ortiz, honorary general manager of the Voluntad Publishing House, was elected general coordinator of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: Struggle of NDFSK Supported in U.S.
DPRK to Boost Cooperation with International Community
Yang Hyong Sop Meets EU Troika Delegation
Political Dialogue between DPRK Foreign Ministry and EU Troika Delegations
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets EU Troika Delegation 
    Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with the Troika delegation of the European Union led by Guido Martini, director general of the Italian Foreign Ministry, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Dec. 10.
 Present there were officials concerned and Swedish and British diplomatic envoys here.

articles.title: Fascist Suppression in S. Korea under Fire
articles.content:
Political Dialogue between DPRK Foreign Ministry and EU Troika Delegations 
    Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- A political dialogue was held here on Dec. 10 between a delegation of the DPRK Foreign Ministry and a Troika delegation of the European Union.
 Present there on the DPRK side were members of the Foreign Ministry delegation led by Director Kim Chun Guk and on the opposite side were members of the Troika delegation of the European Union led by Guido Martini, director general of the Foreign Ministry of Italy which is the present EU chair state, and Swedish, German and British diplomatic envoys here. Discussed at the dialogue were matters of mutual concern including bilateral relations.
